Question
========
  
Which of the following statements is/are correct, assuming other conditions remain the same? I The power of a test changes if the sample size changes. II The power of a test changes if the significance level changes.

  
Answerlist
----------
* Neither proposition is correct.
* Only statement I is correct.
* Only statement II is correct.
* Both statements are correct.
